UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: In-depth Proteomics and Natural Peptidomics Analyses Reveal Antibacterial Peptides in Human Endometrial Fluid
Literature.Author: Azkargorta M, Bregón-Villahoz M, Escobes I, Ibáñez-Pérez J, Iloro I, Iglesias M, Zapirain MD, Rabanal A, Prieto B, Moragues MD, Matorras R, Elortza F

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Candida albicans SC5314(no activity data),Candida glabrata ATCC 90030(MIC=>256µg/ml),Candida krusei ATCC 6258(MIC=>8µg/ml),Escherichia coli CECT 434(MIC=>64µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae CECT 144(no activity data),Enterococcus faecalis CECT 481(MIC=>16µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus CECT 435(MIC=>16µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus MR(MIC=>16µg/ml),Streptococcus agalactiae CECT 183T(MIC=>16µg/ml),Lactobacillus acidophilus CECT 903(no activity data),Gardnerella vaginalis ATCC 14018(no activity data),Bacteroides fragilis ATCC 25285(no activity data),Peptostreptococcus anaerobius ATCC 27337(no activity data)
